randomQuotes.content: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
randomQuotes.author: Albert Einstein

randomQuotes.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
randomQuotes.author: John Lennon

randomQuotes.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
randomQuotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

randomQuotes.content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
randomQuotes.author: Confucius

randomQuotes.content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
randomQuotes.author: Peter Drucker

randomQuotes.content: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
randomQuotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

randomQuotes.content: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
randomQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

randomQuotes.content: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
randomQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis

randomQuotes.content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
randomQuotes.author: Arthur Ashe

randomQuotes.content: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
randomQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

randomQuotes.content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
randomQuotes.author: Muhammad Ali

randomQuotes.content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
randomQuotes.author: Oscar Wilde

randomQuotes.content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
randomQuotes.author: Oscar Wilde

randomQuotes.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
randomQuotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

randomQuotes.content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
randomQuotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

randomQuotes.content: Do one thing every day that scares you.
randomQuotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

randomQuotes.content: Dream big and dare to fail.
randomQuotes.author: Norman Vaughan

randomQuotes.content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
randomQuotes.author: Walt Whitman

randomQuotes.content: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
randomQuotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

randomQuotes.content: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
randomQuotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

randomQuotes.content: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
randomQuotes.author: Jerry Dunn

randomQuotes.content: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
randomQuotes.author: Walt Disney

randomQuotes.content: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
randomQuotes.author: Suzy Kassem

randomQuotes.content: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
randomQuotes.author: Buddha

randomQuotes.content: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
randomQuotes.author: Unknown

Inspirational.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

Inspirational.content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Inspirational.author: Peter Drucker

Inspirational.content: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
Inspirational.author: Wayne Gretzky

Inspirational.content: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Inspirational.author: Confucius

Inspirational.content: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Inspirational.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Inspirational.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Inspirational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Inspirational.author: Arthur Ashe

Inspirational.content: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Inspirational.author: William James

Inspirational.content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

Inspirational.content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Inspirational.author: Zig Ziglar

Inspirational.content: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Inspirational.author: Sam Levenson

Inspirational.content: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
Inspirational.author: Charles R. Swindoll

Inspirational.content: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Inspirational.author: Christian D. Larson

Inspirational.content: Dream big and dare to fail.
Inspirational.author: Norman Vaughan

Inspirational.content: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Inspirational.author: Nelson Mandela

Inspirational.content: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Inspirational.author: Chris Grosser

Inspirational.content: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
Inspirational.author: Estée Lauder

Inspirational.content: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
Inspirational.author: John Muir

Inspirational.content: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Inspirational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Inspirational.author: Henry David Thoreau

Inspirational.content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
Inspirational.author: Muhammad Ali

Inspirational.content: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Inspirational.author: Steve Jobs

Inspirational.content: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Inspirational.author: Roy T. Bennett

Inspirational.content: If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
Inspirational.author: Buddha

Inspirational.content: Do one thing every day that scares you.
Inspirational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Inspirational.content: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Inspirational.author: Henry David Thoreau

Inspirational.content: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
Inspirational.author: C.S. Lewis

Inspirational.content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Inspirational.author: Walt Whitman

Inspirational.content: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
Inspirational.author: Vince Lombardi

Inspirational.content: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
Inspirational.author: Charles Kingsleigh

Inspirational.content: You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
Inspirational.author: A.A. Milne

Inspirational.content: Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
Inspirational.author: Jerry Dunn

Inspirational.content: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Inspirational.author: Suzy Kassem

Inspirational.content: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Inspirational.author: Confucius

Inspirational.content: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
Inspirational.author: Walt Disney

Inspirational.content: Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
Inspirational.author: Will Rogers

Inspirational.content: Small steps in the right direction can turn out to be the biggest step of your life.
Inspirational.author: Unknown

Inspirational.content: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Inspirational.author: Unknown

Inspirational.content: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
Inspirational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Inspirational.content: Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
Inspirational.author: Unknown

Inspirational.content: Strive for progress, not perfection.
Inspirational.author: Unknown

Inspirational.content: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Inspirational.author: George Addair

Inspirational.content: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Inspirational.author: Zig Ziglar

Inspirational.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Inspirational.author: Walt Disney

Inspirational.content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Inspirational.author: Winston Churchill

Inspirational.content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Inspirational.author: Albert Einstein

Motivational.content: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Motivational.author: Steve Jobs

Motivational.content: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Motivational.author: Sam Levenson

Motivational.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Motivational.author: Albert Schweitzer

Motivational.content: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
The future depends on what you do today.
Motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Motivational.content: Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
Motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivational.content: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Failure is the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
Motivational.author: Henry Ford

Motivational.content: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

Motivational.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

Motivational.content: Great things never come from comfort zones.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
Motivational.author: Vince Lombardi

Motivational.content: Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Motivational.author: William James

Motivational.content: Work hard in silence, let your success be your noise.
Motivational.author: Frank Ocean

Motivational.content: If you get tired, learn to rest, not to quit.
Success is what happens after you have survived all your mistakes.
Motivational.author: Anora Lee

Motivational.content: Dream big and dare to fail.
Motivational.author: Norman Vaughan

Motivational.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Motivational.author: Walt Disney

Motivational.content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
Motivational.author: Muhammad Ali

Motivational.content: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Motivational.author: Arthur Ashe

Motivational.content: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Motivational.author: Walt Whitman

Motivational.content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Motivational.author: Confucius

Motivational.content: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
Motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

Motivational.content: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
Motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

Motivational.content: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Little things make big days.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Motivational.author: Henry David Thoreau

Motivational.content: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivational.content: It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
Motivational.author: Dr. Henry Link

Motivational.content: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Motivational.author: Abraham Lincoln

Motivational.content: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Motivational.author: Christian D. Larson

Motivational.content: Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Motivational.author: Chris Grosser

Motivational.content: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
Motivational.author: Thomas Jefferson

Motivational.content: Great things are done by a series of small things brought together.
Motivational.author: Vincent Van Gogh

Motivational.content: You don’t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

Motivational.content: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
Motivational.author: Stephen Covey

Motivational.content: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
Motivational.author: Roy T. Bennett

Motivational.content: Never regret a day in your life. Good days bring happiness and bad days give you experience.
Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
Motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

Motivational.content: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Motivational.author: Colin R. Davis

Motivational.content: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

Motivational.content: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.

Happiness.content: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Happiness.author: Aristotle

Happiness.content: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it’s all that matters.
Happiness.author: Audrey Hepburn

Happiness.content: For every minute you are angry, you lose sixty seconds of happiness.
Happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Happiness.content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.content: The purpose of life is to enjoy every moment.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
Happiness.author: John Lennon

Happiness.content: Happiness is a warm puppy.
Happiness.author: Charles M. Schulz

Happiness.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Happiness.author: Albert Schweitzer

Happiness.content: Happiness is the highest good.
Happiness.author: Aristotle

Happiness.content: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
Happiness.author: Sarah Louise Delany

Happiness.content: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Happiness.author: C.S. Lewis

Happiness.content: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
Happiness.author: Buddha

Happiness.content: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
Happiness.author: Sydney J. Harris

Happiness.content: The purpose of life is to be happy.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.content: The secret to happiness is to let every situation be what it is.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.
Happiness.author: Ralph Marston

Happiness.content: Be happy with what you have while working for what you want.
Happiness.author: Helen Keller

Happiness.content: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
Happiness.author: Mark Twain

Happiness.content: Happiness is a state of mind. It’s just according to the way you look at things.
Happiness.author: Walt Disney

Happiness.content: Happiness is not a destination. It is a way of life.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
Happiness.author: Walt Whitman

Happiness.content: The most certain way to be happy is to seek happiness for others.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: A smile is the best makeup any girl can wear.
Happiness.author: Marilyn Monroe

Happiness.content: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
Happiness.author: Dalai Lama

Happiness.content: Laugh, and the world laughs with you. Cry, and you cry alone.
Happiness.author: Ella Wheeler

Happiness.content: Happiness is the feeling you get when you’re feeling good.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
Happiness.author: Buddha

Happiness.content: Happiness is like a butterfly. The more you chase it, the more it eludes you. But if you turn your attention to other things, it comes and sits softly on your shoulder.
Happiness.author: Henry David Thoreau

Happiness.content: True happiness is not something that is acquired, but something that is given.
Happiness.author: Unknown

Happiness.content: The best way to find happiness is to lose yourself in the service of others.
Happiness.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Happiness.content: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
Happiness.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

Happiness.content: You’re never fully dressed without a smile.
Happiness.author: Martin Charnin

Friendship.content: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
Friendship.author: Walter Winchell

Friendship.content: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
Friendship.author: Woodrow Wilson

Friendship.content: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
Friendship.author: Elbert Hubbard

Friendship.content: True friends are like diamonds — bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.
Friendship.author: Nicole Richie

Friendship.content: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
Friendship.author: Thomas Aquinas

Friendship.content: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
Friendship.author: Henry Van Dyke

Friendship.content: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
Friendship.author: Mencius

Friendship.content: A good friend knows all your stories. A best friend helped you create them.
Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.'
Friendship.author: C.S. Lewis

Friendship.content: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
Friendship.author: David Tyson

Friendship.content: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
Friendship.author: Leo Buscaglia

Friendship.content: Friendship is not about whom you have known the longest, but who came and never left your side.
Good friends are like stars. You don’t always see them, but you know they’re always there.
Friends are the family you choose.
Friendship.author: Jess C. Scott

Friendship.content: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he’d rather be anywhere else.
Friendship.author: Len Wein

Friendship.content: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
Friendship.author: John Evelyn

Friendship.content: Life was meant for good friends and great adventures.
Friendship isn’t a big thing, it’s a million little things.
Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
Friendship.author: Euripides

Friendship.content: A friend to all is a friend to none.
Friendship.author: Aristotle

Friendship.content: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.
Real friendship is when your friend comes over to your house and then you both just take a nap.
A friend who understands your tears is much more valuable than a lot of friends who only know your smile.
Sometimes being with your best friend is all the therapy you need.
Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It’s not something you learn in school. But if you haven’t learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven’t learned anything.
Friendship.author: Muhammad Ali

Friendship.content: Best friends are the people in your life who make you laugh louder, smile brighter, and live better.
The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
Friendship.author: Elisabeth Foley

Friendship.content: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
No friendship is an accident.
Friendship.author: O. Henry

Friendship.content: There are friends, there is family, and then there are friends that become family.
A friend is someone who makes it easy to believe in yourself.
Friendship.author: Heidi Wills

Friendship.content: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
Friendship.author: Ed Cunningham

Friendship.content: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
Friendship.author: Khalil Gibran

Friendship.content: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
Friendship.author: Arnold H. Glasow

Friendship.content: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
Friendship.author: Euripides

Friendship.content: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
Friendship.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

Friendship.content: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
Friends are like walls. Sometimes you lean on them, and sometimes it's good just knowing they are there.
Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
Friendship.author: Jean de La Fontaine

Friendship.content: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have and one of the best things you can be.
Friendship.author: Winnie The Pooh

Friendship.content: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
Friendship.author: Bernard Meltzer

Friendship.content: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
Friendship.author: Linda Grayson

Friendship.content: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
Friendship.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

Friendship.content: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
Friendship.author: Donna Roberts

Friendship.content: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
Friendship.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Friendship.content: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
Friendship.author: Baltasar Gracián

Friendship.content: A true friend is forever a friend.
Friendship.author: George MacDonald

Friendship.content: Friendship is the only flower that blooms in all seasons.
A friend is someone who can see the truth and pain in you even when you are fooling everyone else.
Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them… your smile, your hope, and your courage.

Success.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Success.author: Albert Schweitzer

Success.content: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.content: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Success.author: Colin R. Davis

Success.content: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success.author: Henry David Thoreau

Success.content: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
Success.author: Chris Grosser

Success.content: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller

Success.content: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Success.author: Thomas Jefferson

Success.content: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Success.author: Bo Bennett

Success.content: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
Success.author: Bobby Unser

Success.content: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Success.author: Vidal Sassoon

Success.content: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don’t quit.
Success.author: Conrad Hilton

Success.content: There are no secrets to success. It is the result of preparation, hard work, and learning from failure.
Success.author: Colin Powell

Success.content: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Success.author: Robert Collier

Success.content: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Success.author: Walt Disney

Success.content: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
Success.author: Roy T. Bennett

Success.content: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success.author: Winston Churchill

Success.content: Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.content: Success is achieved and maintained by those who try and keep trying.
Success.author: W. Clement Stone

Success.content: Ambition is the path to success. Persistence is the vehicle you arrive in.
Success.author: Bill Bradley

Success.content: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Success.author: Winston S. Churchill

Success.content: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
Success.author: John D. Rockefeller Jr.

Success.content: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Success.author: Confucius

Success.content: Success is a journey, not a destination.
Success.author: Arthur Ashe

Success.content: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.content: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
Success.author: Mark Twain

Success.content: Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
Success.author: Albert Einstein

Success.content: I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
Success.author: Estée Lauder

Success.content: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
Success.author: George S. Patton

Success.content: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
Success.author: Robert F. Kennedy

Success.content: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
Success.author: Anonymous

Success.content: Success isn’t just about what you accomplish in your life; it’s about what you inspire others to do.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.content: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
Success.author: Maya Angelou

Success.content: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Success.content: Successful people do what unsuccessful people are not willing to do. Don’t wish it were easier; wish you were better.
Success.author: Jim Rohn

Success.content: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
Success.author: George Bernard Shaw

Success.content: Success is not measured by what you accomplish, but by the opposition you have encountered, and the courage with which you have maintained the struggle against overwhelming odds.
Success.author: Orison Swett Marden

Success.content: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
Success.author: David Brinkley

Success.content: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
Success.author: Dale Carnegie

Success.content: Action is the foundational key to all success.
Success.author: Pablo Picasso

Success.content: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed.
Success.author: Booker T. Washington

Success.content: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph.
Success.author: Zig Ziglar

Success.content: The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won’t. It’s whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it; whether you choose to persevere.
Success.author: Barack Obama

Success.content: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Success.author: Steve Jobs

Success.content: Success is not the absence of failure; it’s the persistence through failure.
Success.author: Aisha Tyler

Success.content: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
Success.author: Robert Kiyosaki

Success.content: Success is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you get.
Success.author: W.P. Kinsella

Success.content: The difference between who you are and who you want to be is what you do.
Success.author: Unknown

Success.content: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Success.author: Ralph Marston

Success.content: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
Success.author: Napoleon Hill

Success.content: Dream big and dare to fail.
Success.author: Norman Vaughan

Life.content: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Life.author: Albert Einstein

Life.content: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
Life.author: John Lennon

Life.content: The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.
Life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Life.content: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
Life.author: Mark Twain

Life.content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Life.author: Mae West

Life.content: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Life.author: Helen Keller

Life.content: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
Life.author: Abraham Lincoln

Life.content: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
Life.author: Muhammad Ali

Life.content: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Life.author: Albert Schweitzer

Life.content: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
Life.author: Brian Tracy

Life.content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
Life.author: Oscar Wilde

Life.content: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
Life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Life.content: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning how to dance in the rain.
Life.author: Vivanne Greene

Life.content: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
Life.author: Robert Frost

Life.content: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.
Life.author: Bertrand Russell

Life.content: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
Life.author: Sarah Louise Delany

Life.content: Don’t cry because it’s over, smile because it happened.
Life.author: Dr. Seuss

Life.content: It always seems impossible until it’s done.
Life.author: Nelson Mandela

Life.content: Be not simply good; be good for something.
Life.author: Henry David Thoreau

Life.content: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
Life.author: Unknown

Life.content: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
Life.author: Oprah Winfrey

Life.content: Everything you can imagine is real.
Life.author: Pablo Picasso

Life.content: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Life.author: Confucius

Life.content: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
Life.author: Oscar Wilde

Life.content: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
Life.author: Oprah Winfrey

Life.content: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
Life.author: Steve Jobs

Life.content: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
Life.author: Victor Hugo

Life.content: It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
Life.author: Epictetus

Life.content: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
Life.author: Pablo Picasso

Life.content: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Life.author: Suzy Kassem

Life.content: The purpose of life is to contribute in some way to making things better.
Life.author: Robert F. Kennedy

Life.content: Life can only be understood backwards; but it must be lived forwards.
Life.author: Søren Kierkegaard

Life.content: When one door of happiness closes, another opens.
Life.author: Helen Keller

Life.content: The best revenge is massive success.
Life.author: Frank Sinatra

Life.content: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Life.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Life.content: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Life.author: George Bernard Shaw

Life.content: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
Life.author: Aristotle

Life.content: Live life as if everything is rigged in your favor.
Life.author: Rumi

Life.content: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.
Life.author: Jackie Robinson

Life.content: You don't have to be richer to live better.
Life.author: Unknown

Life.content: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Life.author: Nelson Mandela

Life.content: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
Life.author: Grandma Moses

Life.content: Life isn’t about finding yourself. It’s about creating yourself.
Life.author: George Bernard Shaw

Life.content: There are no regrets in life, just lessons.
Life.author: Jennifer Aniston

Life.content: Life is too short to wait.
Life.author: Unknown

Life.content: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
Life.author: David Viscott

Life.content: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
Life.author: Khalil Gibran

Life.content: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Life.author: Confucius

Life.content: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
Life.author: Tony Robbins

Life.content: Life is not about the destination, it’s about the journey.
Life.author: Unknown
